verses.name: 1 John 5:1
verses.text: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God: and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him.

verses.name: 1 John 5:2
verses.text: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God, and keep his commandments.

verses.name: 1 John 5:3
verses.text: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.

verses.name: 1 John 5:4
verses.text: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our faith.
